name: Super Major Miner
description:
My name is Matthew Anderson, and Jigson's the game making name I came up with. We make colorful games here, and here we'll be showing Super Major Miner  (or Major Miner for short).

Major Miner Gameplay

In Major Miner, your goal is to collect enough treasure in the sack (usually near the start). You stack treasure in your hands until you can't carry anymore -- the blue meter on the right is your Weight Gauge. Some treasure is hidden within ground, so you'll need to use your pickaxe to uncover it.  Hidden treasure will gleam when approached. There are also enemies to fight.

Nothing is final, the game is still being developed.

Major Miner Features

- Full controller support -- with button mapping options

- 2-player Co-op

- Tons of fun, with more to come!

More updates to come!

I will be posting more on Twitter, so check it out. Most likely a few updates here and there. You can expect pixel art, music and game updates. You can also check out Jigson's Instagram page for updates! Twitter: @JigsonGames Instagram: jigsongames
